item.description:
Who doesn't enjoy a good rendition of Shakespeare while slightly toasted???

Let's meet at the Purple Shamrock (subject to change so check back before you leave the house), have a few drinks, and walk over to the Common to enjoy some Shakespeare!!!

Now remember, it is Shakespeare, so we should not get so banged-up that we can't understand what the thespians are saying.

PLAY: Coriolanus (Yeah, I hadn't heard of it either)

TIME: We'll meet for drinks most likely in Faneuil Hall somewhere at 530 but the play won't start till 8pm. We should plan on getting to the Common by 730 to secure decent seats (i.e., leave the bar at 710PM)

COVER CHARGE: No cover charge

IF THE PLAY SUCKS: This is my third time and they always do a good job. Plus, it is Shakespeare and he's kind of respected and everything...But if push comes to shove, we can leave at half time and meander about and most likely go back to the bar :)

BEFORE YOU COME: CHECK THIS SITE!!! I may have to move the meeting location.

SUGGESTION: Bring a blanket, water bottle, snack and maybe a folding chair. If you have knee or back problems I highly recommend this.

The last two times were a blast so don't miss out on this!!!!
item.name: Booze and Shakespeare
